Greetings to Slovak President
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovak President 
    Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, yesterday sent a message of greetings to Rudolf Schuster, President of Slovakia, on the occasion of its constitutional day.
 The message extended sincere congratulations to the president, government and people of Slovakia on the day.    
 It expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger and develop in the common interests.

articles.title: Greetings to Uzbek President
articles.content:
Greetings to Uzbek President 
    Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on August 29 sent a message of greetings to Uzbek President Islam Karimov on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of its independence.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president, government and people of Uzbekistan on the occasion.    
 It expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms and wished the president great success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people.
